page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {Southill}village is a very quiet and beautiful place.The village is almost a hamlet,there are very few houses.{ {Southill}has a {primary school}and one church.Most of the houses in{Southill are owned by a brewery.The tiny roads of{Southill}are lined with many evergreens and trees.There is only one main road.The people of Southll only have telephones and are able to post letters.There are no other forms of communication,only talking.Most people in{Southill}only have{electricity}as there is no{gas}at all.The village shop has no gas just{electricity}and a coal fire.All the houses in Southill differ in many ways;there are{ {thatched}houses which were built in{ {1797}.Also there are{slate}roofed houses which were built in{1896}.There are also a few houses that were built after these.
